content:
@Alex Crichton FYI, I think https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/9384 has caused a problem where the hash for crates.io has changed. This causes it to require redownloading everything in the cache.

Would it make sense to re-add a manual Ord?
Do we want to re add the test that compeers the hash to a string?
haha, yea, I was thinking the same thing, would probably be a good idea.
we should probably commit to a more canonical hashing scheme or identifier scheme for crates.io at some point
it's annoying that unrelated changes like this end up forcing us to do weirder things in Cargo
I posted https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/9397, and wow it turns out we have a really backwards reason for deriving Hash and implementing Ord
